quotes.quote: Never rush into a relationship. True love is bound to reveal itself sooner or later.
Never rush in love for it never runs out. Let love be the one to knock on your door so that by the time you start to feel, you'll know it's real.
If we're waiting for the most convenient time to say I LOVE YOU, we may never find one.
I've learned that waiting is the most difficult bit, and I want to get used to the feeling, knowing that you're with me, even when you're not by my side.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering.
The right person will come, once you have suffered enough to deserve her.
I have died everyday waiting for you. Darling don't be afraid. I have loved you for a thousand years. I'll love you a thousand more.
Sometimes waiting is the hardest thing of all.
If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
If I am really a part of your dream, you'll come back one day.
Good things come to those who wait, Better things come to those who try.
You cant force someone to care, you can only sit and wait till everything catches up to them and when it finally does maybe then they'll realize what they lost.
Delay is a bitter tonic, but it increases appetite.
Our willingness to wait reveals the value we place on what we're waiting for
There are people out there who are waiting to meet you. Waiting to love you. You have to stick around for them.
How much of human life is lost in waiting.
Waiting is a trap. There will always be reasons to wait. The truth is, there are only two things in life, reasons and results, and reasons simply don't count.
Love is everything it's cracked up to be It really is worth fighting for, being brave for, risking everything for.
People count up the faults of those who keep them waiting
We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
Two souls with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.
Waiting is the rust of the soul.
The right man comes at the right time.
There is no great achievement that is not the result of patient working and waiting.
All things come to him who waits- provided he knows what he is waiting for.

Whatever we are waiting for -- peace of mind, contentment, grace, the inner awareness of simple abundance -- it will surely come to us, but only when we are ready to receive it with an open and grateful heart.

To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.
I was made and meant to look for you and wait for you and become yours forever.
If you can't ignore imperfections, then your imaginary ideal soulmate will always remain pending till you grow old and die.
